ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: *Teltoli snarled, she was just about to fire upon Brightblade when Iron Raptor had called her. But somehow she could tell Iron Raptor had at least some rank,

*Teltoli snarled, she was just about to fire upon Brightblade when Iron Raptor had called her. But somehow she could tell Iron Raptor had at least some rank, more than her, so she went back to animal form and flew just above the ground, it being faster*

*She dodges a bot and flew up beside Iron Raptor* "So, are we gonna blow up the Ark or something?" *she yells over the melee of battle* "It seems a perfectly good time!"

------Original Message------
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Sent: May 5, 2000 4:52:06 AM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars



* Iris was through powering up the weapon and now began to slowly activate 
it so that it's energy wouldn't run out to quickly, soon small waves of 
power began to make their way along the walls and floor of the Ark. At best 
at the moment the Predacons would feel enough shock to make them dance to 
keep their feet from touching the ground, at least it was a sort of defence.
Iris decided that through out the battle she would increase the voltage as 
needed, it was her idea of fun!

____________________________________________:):):):)_______________


* Iron Raptor stopped and looked back towards the Ark, it seemed so 
vulnerable at the moment...as wall as it's inhabitance.
She had to do something before they were completely defeated, and the time 
to act was now!
Iron Raptor opened her com-link to Teltoli...*

" Teltoli, forget the Predacons...head for the ship and follow me to the 
weapon's hold. I have a plan."

* She closed her link and began to run faster towards the Ark, a vague idea 
in her mind. It was time to go on the attack instead of the defensive, it 
was time for then to cause the damage instead of trying to protect from it!
Iron Raptor sighed as she ran towards the base, it was risky but already the 
plan was forming within her mind. The beginning was risky and would leave 
some of the Ark undefended but if it worked then the Predacons would soon be 
flushed from the base!
She smiled to herself, now it was time to get a few other friends into 
action!
Iron Raptor opened her com-link to a new frequency...one of a new bot...*

" This is Iron Raptor to bot 6112 (Fracturcon), please report to the 
entrance of the Maximal base. I will meet you there."

* She closed her link one last time, she needed extra hands to carry a few 
extra weapons!*
